scripts.build-aws: rimraf -rf ./dist/*.* ./.cache && NODE_ENV=production parcel build --public-url /editor src/index.html && npm run upload-aws
scripts.upload-aws: sudo ssh -i ~/Documents/lightsail/LightsailDefaultKey-ap-northeast-2.pem ubuntu@console.sgiot.com.tw 'cd /home/ubuntu/beexant-webeditor && rm -f ./*.js ./*.css ./*.html' && sudo scp -i ~/Documents/lightsail/LightsailDefaultKey-ap-northeast-2.pem dist/*.html dist/*.js dist/*.css ubuntu@console.sgiot.com.tw:/home/ubuntu/beexant-webeditor
